channel.title: 317 pi, i feel like a retard asking this but setting objects at different height
channel.description:
lets say i want to add an object at 2406, 3408 but at height 0, 1, 2 how would it be done?
something like this? [code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3205, 3227, 1,
2); //some annoying stairs c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,
2); //some annoying stairs c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,
1); //some annoying stairs c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3205, 3228, 1,
1); //some annoying stairs c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,
0); //some annoying stairs[/code]

item.title: 317 pi, i feel like a retard asking this but setting objects at different height
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

Are you asking how to add it on each level 0 height, 1 height , and 2 height?

if you are just make three different objects using same coords just different height

hope that helped if I was wrong about you problem please tell meâ€¦

item.description:
@jwags wrote:

lets say i want to add an object at 2406, 3408 but at height 0, 1, 2 how would it be done?

something like this?

[code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3205, 3227, 1,

2); //some annoying stairs
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,

2); //some annoying stairs
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,

1); //some annoying stairs
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3205, 3228, 1,

1); //some annoying stairs
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2619, 3206, 3228, 1,

0); //some annoying stairs[/code]
